minChunkViewDist.desc:: The minimum chunk view distance allowed to use. Default: 10, minimum 3, maximum 200

maxChunkViewDist.desc:: The maximum chunk view distance allowed to use. Set to the max a player could benefit from. Default: 10, minimum 3, maximum 200

meanAvgTickTime.desc:: The average tick time to stabilize the distances around. Setting it higher than 50ms is not advised, as after 50ms the TPS will go below 20. Default: 45ms, min: 10, max:100

viewDistanceUpdateRate.desc:: The change frequency of distances in seconds. Default: 30, min:1, max:1000

minSimulationDist.desc:: The minimum simulation distance allowed to use. Default: 4, minimum 1, maximum 200

maxSimulationDist.desc:: The maximum simulation distance allowed to use. Default: 10, minimum 1, maximum 200

adjustSimulationDistance.desc:: Enables automatic simulation distance adjustment. Default: true

logMessages.desc:: Whether to output log messages for actions done. This can be helpful to balance the other settings nicely. Default = false
